title: BurnAware Pro v7.2.0 Incl Crack + Keygen [TorDigger]
description:
BurnAware Professional

BurnAware Professional - an updated version of the universal program for recording and copying different disks - CD, DVD, Blu-Ray and HD-DVD, as well as copying CD and DVD. The program allows you to perform all the basic tasks of writing: working with native CD / DVD, Blu-Ray; record Audio CD and DVD-Video; copying and burning images; disk cloning; supports multisession, also has additional tools for creating copies of CD and DVD with photos, documents, movies, games and music, and more. There is a multilingual interface, including Russian and support Windows 7/8. 

The latest versions of the updated user interface, added and updated localizations, added new dialogs and options, improved support for special characters, fixed problems with the creation of some types of disks, as well as significantly improved engine for recording media. BurnAware supports all types of optical storage media (CD-R/RW, DVD-R/RW, DVD + R / RW, BD-R/RE, HD-DVD-R/RW and DVD-RAM) and a wide range of writing drives. 

Main features:

- Record from any types of media CD / DVD, and Blu-Ray (BD-R/BD-RE) 
- Burn CDs from images 
- Record disc format DVD-Video from video files 
- Record Audio CD from files of WAV, MP3 or WMA 
- Creation of disk images 
- Ability to use multisession for all media types 
- Supports all current hardware interfaces 
- Record on the fly for all kinds of supported images 
- Automatic verification of recorded data 
- Unicode support for work on different language versions of the OS 
- Simple, intuitive and customizable user interface 
- Work in the operating systems Windows 2000/XP/Vista / 7 / x64 

Changes in version 7.2: 

New Features 
* Added new CD-Text detection method, to avoid incorrect FLAC and MP3 tags 

Updates & Improvements 
* Main window has been adapted for high screen resolutions 
* Verify Tool has been updated and now provides byte-by-byte verification 
* Updated burning engine and translations 
* Improved buffer control while buring high capacity DVD and Blu-ray Discs 

Bug Fixes 
* Resolved user interface problem with non-standard system fonts 
* Fixed bug with sorting files by priority, prior to burning process 
* Minor fixes and improvements to graphical user interface

System Requirements:

Windows 8 and Windows XP/Vista/7 (both 32 and 64-bit)

Homepage: http://www.burnaware.com/burnaware_professional.html

Installation Instructions: 

- Install program.
- Instructions to Register application given in crack folder.
- Done, Enjoy.

Have A Nice Day
